title: Upcycling of sugar refining mud solid waste as a novel adsorbent for removing methylene blue and Congo red from wastewater
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,13505-13520
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01451K, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Aly Reda Aly, Abdel-Ghafar El-Demerdash, Wagih Sadik, Essam El Rafy, Tamer Shoeib
The feasibility of utilizing the mud solid waste produced during sugar refining as a cost-effective and environmentally friendly alternative for the removal of methylene blue and Congo red from wastewater is presented.
